      • TDK

TDK

2021-01-01

该项为可选置项，map[string]interface{}类型，包含index, i18n等信息

在主题目录 theme.toml，可配置该项

[theme.tdk]

[[theme.tdk]
index = { title = 'Fungo - simple and fast static site engine ', description = 'Fungo is a simple and fast static site engine, which can help you start writing without programming.', keyword = 'static site engine, Fungo' }
i18n = { title = 'Fungo - simple and fast static site engine ', description = 'Fungo is a simple and fast static site engine, which can help you start writing without programming.', keyword = 'static site engine, Fungo' }

Notice:

该项所定义内容，在任意模板页均可使用
该项为字典类型，支持配置多个非重名[name]配置项
该内容仅为使用方法举例，具体配置以使用主题配置文件为准。

index

设置index的TDK信息

title

设置index标题

description

设置index的描述

keyword

设置index的关键词
